Html:
Hello everybody,

Is it possible to add an horizontal target line in a vertical bar chart ? I did'nt found the way for it... Could someone help me please ?

Thank's a lot

Mathieu

Hello,

I found the solution. I have to use two differents type of plot in the same chart. I have to add a linechart type to my vertical bar chart.

I hope this post will help someone.

Math
